text: hi, do you have time to think about children?
I sure do! Is this for a charity?
yes it is. saving children. are you willing to contribute?
Well, that depends. What does the charity do for children?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
I'm pretty broke right now. Do you accept small donations?
anything can go along way to help the kids.
What can two dollars do?
2 dollars can do a lot, provide food or cloths for some kid. how much would you like to donate?
I would like to donate my last two dollars.
that would be really nice. is there any other information you would like to know about the charity?
Yes, where are these kids located?
the kids are in third world countries.
Can I send them presents, or just the donation/
small  will indeed help a lot of children and their families. even presents are acceptable.
Is my donation tax deductible?
no it is not. it is tax free.
What projects are being worked on right now?
helping the children and their families. thank you a lot for your contribution if there is nothing else.
I am glad to contribute two dollars!
thank you! : ) God bless you.
